page.title: 05RECREATION- sport
page.content: Stamford offers a variety of sports activities. Stamford high school sports hall is used by the school in the day and by other local groups in the evenings and weekends. The activities offered are gymnastics, trampolining, volley ball, tennis, golf, archery, five a side soccer, hockey, netball, table tennis and trimnastics. The hall can be booked for private functions (e.g. roller skating). The school pool is indoor and heated and is used by clubs in town as well as the school. The town pool is open air but heated and open from May to September. Rowing boats can be hired on the river in the summer. YMCA offers keep fit classes,weight training and a tae Kwon Do class. In Stamford there is a Rugby club,Golf Club, cricket club, and football club (the Daniels)
